column2: with some solid sides as well. Brisket was excellent
column3: though just on the dry side
column4: turkey is moist and flavor-packed. Pulled pork is good as well. Sausage was kind of a miss. Not a huge fan of their sauces
column5: but they are not bad either. The okra side was surprisingly well-done
column7: garlicky and not mushy. Charro beans were flavorful. Nice space.
